basics.name: Alan Weng
basics.label: CS @ RPI | Software Engineering
basics.summary: Computer Science Student and Undergraduate Researcher at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute. Passionate about building meaningful and useful software.

experience.name: Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute
experience.position: Undergraduate Research Assistant - Supply Chain Negotiation Simulation
experience.summary: Collaborating with faculty to design a web-based educational game that trains students in supply chain contracting and negotiation using Generative AI agents.
highlights: Developed AI prompting framework for adaptive negotiation styles (risk-averse, collaborative, opportunistic)
Designed contract drafting, AI-driven strategies, event-driven market shifts, and trust/reputation scoring
Contributed ideas on learning objectives and alignment for educational research goals

projects.name: ResearchPi
projects.description: Researcher Profile Generator: Aggregates academic papers from multiple sources and creates profiles of researcher using NLP and LLM-based tagging.
highlights: Integrated five academic APIs (arXiv, PubMed, DOAJ, Zenodo, Crossref)
Implemented robust rate-limited fetching and retry strategies
Generated structured researcher summaries using KeyBERT and OpenRouter LLMs

projects.name: Citrus Notes
projects.description: Full-stack mobile note app with document scanning and cloud file management.
highlights: Implemented document capture using OpenCV for edge detection and perspective correction
Developed REST API with FastAPI and MongoDB Atlas storage
Implemented robust fetching with try/except, request timeouts, per-provider rate limiting, and retries; added fallback query strategies (alternate names/IDs) to recover from failed or partial lookups

projects.name: RPI Competitive Programming Club Website
projects.description: Official club website featuring events, resources, and board member profiles.
highlights: Designed responsive frontend in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Led accessibility and UI/UX improvements through Figma mockups
Collaborated on GitHub for open-source development

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
highlights: Designed and developed personal website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to showcase projects and experience.

projects.name: Object Detection with Region-based CNNs (RCNN) -- Course Project
highlights: Implemented RCNN object detection with a modified ResNet-18 backbone for classification and localization tasks.

projects.name: Image Stitching and Panorama Creation -- Course Project
highlights: Built a computer vision pipeline for panorama stitching using SIFT, RANSAC, and homography estimation.
